General.Name: Idealist Danismanlik AS
General.Description: Ideal Finansal Teknolojiler ve Danismanlik Anonim Sirketi operates as a management consulting company in Turkey. The company provides consultancy services in the fields of organizational development and human resources. It also offers competency development, management development, leadership development, change and engagement, sales management, and smart management development solutions. In addition, the company organizes summits on human resources and marketing activities. It serves the finance, pharmaceutical, fast moving consumer goods, telecommunications, and holding and other sectors. The company was formerly known as Idealist Danismanlik A.S. and changed its name to Ideal Finansal Teknolojiler ve Danismanlik Anonim Sirketi in September 2021. Ideal Finansal Teknolojiler ve Danismanlik Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
